indexesField1 - Variable in class gameboard.tiles.FieldTile
HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 1
indexesField2 - Variable in class gameboard.tiles.FieldTile
HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 2
indexesField3 - Variable in class gameboard.tiles.FieldTile
HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 3
INFORMATION_BOX - Variable in class gui.model.GameInformation
the InformationBox object of the actual game that is initialized in the constructor
informationBox - Variable in class gui.view.GameScene
object of the class InformationBox to add it to the gamePane
informationBox - Variable in class gui.view.InformationBox
HBox that holds all the text fields
InformationBox - Class in gui.view
This class implements a VBOX, that contains text fields for all the necessary information that the player needs while playing such as amount of money, time, ... and a button to get back to the menu.
InformationBox() - Constructor for class gui.view.InformationBox
Constructs an object of the class InformationBox and initializes the box immediately.
initGameLoop(GameScene, FieldTile, GameValue, MovingObjectController) - Method in class gui.controller.GameController
This method implements the timer and with every 100 milliseconds it calls the methods moveObject(), proofAction(), and proofFieldAction() from the class movingObjectController.
initializeButton() - Method in class gui.view.HelpScene
This method implements the button that makes it possible to go back to the menuScene.
initializeButtons() - Method in class gui.view.DifficultyScene
This method implements the buttons of the scene.
initializeButtons() - Method in class gui.view.MenuScene
This method implements the buttons of the menu.
initializeDifficultyPane() - Method in class gui.view.DifficultyScene
This method sets the style of the difficultyPane and initializes the buttons with the method initializeButtons().
initializeFunctionality() - Method in class gui.controller.MovingObjectController
This method initializes an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController and hands to the constructor the GAME_SCENE object of the actual game.
initializeGameScene(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, int, int, int, int, int, GameController) - Method in class gui.view.GameScene
This method implements all the Nodes for the game scene with the help of the other classes InformationBox, Matchfield and SideControlPane.
initializeHashMaps() - Method in class gameboard.tiles.FieldTile
This method implements all the HashMaps, that are needed for cultivating, sowing and harvesting the fields.
initializeHelpPane() - Method in class gui.view.HelpScene
This method initializes the helpPane.
initializeInformationBox() - Method in class gui.view.GameScene
This method gets the informationBox from the class InformationBox that implements a HBOX with all the information for the player.
initializeInformationBox() - Method in class gui.view.InformationBox
This method sets the size and layout of the box and fills the box with text fields and a button with the help of the method fillInformationBox().
initializeMatchfield() - Method in class gui.view.Matchfield
Sets the size and style of the matchfield grid pane and adds columns and rows.
initializeMatchfield(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class gui.view.GameScene
This method gets the matchfield from the class Matchfield that implements the grid pane of the matchfield and adds it to the gamePane.
initializeMenuPane() - Method in class gui.view.MenuScene
This method sets the style of the menuPane and initializes the buttons with the method initializeButtons().
initializeMovingObject(int, int, int) - Method in class gui.view.Matchfield
This method initializes the moving object on the field.
initializeSecondMovingObject(int, int, int) - Method in class gui.view.Matchfield
This method initializes a second object on the field.
initializeSecondMovingObject(MovingObject, Tractor) - Method in class gui.controller.MovingObjectFunctionalityController
This method implements a second image view that holds the image of the exited tractor and eventually of the attached working device.
initializeSideControlPane(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, GameController) - Method in class gui.view.GameScene
This method gets the sideControlPane from the class SideControlPane that implements a Pane with all the buttons to move around the matchfield and to choose the machine / farmer and adds it to the gamePane.
initializeSidePane(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Method in class gui.view.SideControlPane
Sets the size and layout of the pane and creates all the nodes with the help of the other methods of the class.
initializeStage() - Method in class gui.view.ViewManager
Initializes the mainStage.
initializeText() - Method in class gui.view.HelpScene
This method implements the help text.
initilizeScene() - Method in class gui.view.ViewManager
Initializes the menuScene as first scene shown in the game on the mainStage.
